item.title: About
item.description:
Hello, my name is Mateus Kern, you can call me Kern. I currently live in southern Brazil. I have interest in science fiction, right to privacy, security, freedom of information, international affairs, history, music, television shows, astronomy, space exploration, military aviation and woodworking.

Professional

I spent my time gaining knowledge and experience in my three main areas of interest: security, software development and system administration.

Please see more about my professional life at the hire me page.

item.title: Professional
item.description:
My main three areas of interest are security, software development and system administration.

Although I tend to keep my knowledge and experience agnostic in terms of tools, preferences and specializations are needed and mine are: Ansible, docker, GNU/Linux Debian, python and nginx webserver.

I have some of my personal projects on github and I write about them, other experiences and opinions on this website.

I’m currently looking for a junior position (preferably remote) linked to my ares of interest (e.g. System Administrator, Software Developer, Security Researcher, etc.) that will give me the opportunity to help the company grow as I enhance my experiences and knowledgde.

If you are interested in hiring me, please send me a email or contact me through the number +55 (51) 9793-8559.

You can view my resume.
